title: How to use Charles Viancin® SUNFLOWER® silicone lids?
description:
View the demo of our Charles Viancin® SUNFLOWER® innovative, fun & functional silicone lids, inspired by the vibrant colors of the sunflower.

Our lids in a nutshell : 
- Easy to use
- Save on plastic wrap & aluminium foil
- Airtight seal
- Oven & microwave safe. All flame.
- Easy to clean and dishwasher safe

Our lids are available in many other styles
